author: raghushantha
body:
```
PS C:\> dir 'C:\Program Files\PowerShell' 

    Directory: C:\Program Files\PowerShell

Mode                LastWriteTime         Length Name                                                                                                                                                                                                            
----                -------------         ------ ----                                                                                                                                                                                                            
da----        7/11/2016   4:18 PM                0.6.0.6                                                                                                                                                                                                         
d-----        7/12/2016   3:56 PM                0.6.0.8                                                                                                                                                                                                         

PS C:\> Get-Package -Name PowerShell* -ProviderName MSI

Name                           Version          Source                           ProviderName                                                                                                                                                                    
----                           -------          ------                           ------------                                                                                                                                                                    
PowerShell_0.6.0.6             0.6.0.6                                           msi                                                                                                                                                                             
PowerShell_0.6.0.8             0.6.0.8                                           msi                                                                                                                                                                             

```

Shows up as separate APPS

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11727200/16786575/b0888698-484a-11e6-89c3-7eb56b019445.png)

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11727200/16786624/046336f0-484b-11e6-9a3e-9bbf84f3913c.png)

comments.author: raghushantha
comments.body: I am going to merge this change since CI is good and Since I tested the changes manually

title: Add ability to perform SxS install in MSI package manifest
